forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. West northwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun descends into the evening, Downtown San Francisco is graced by a clear sky, a serene backdrop that cradles the city in tranquil hues. The earlier brilliance of daylight has given way to a gentle twilight, with the temperature drifting towards a comfortable 56 degrees. A light breeze, whispering from the northwest at 9 to 13 mph, dances through the streets, carrying the promise of a mild night. 

Looking ahead, Monday will usher in sunshine and warmth, with a high approaching 74 degrees. The city will bask under bright skies, a perfect invitation for outdoor pursuits. Dress comfortably, perhaps in layers that transition seamlessly from the mild morning chill to the inviting afternoon warmth. Should you choose to step into the embracing sunshine, a simple stroll along the Embarcadero or a leisurely coffee at a sidewalk café could provide a refreshing respite, allowing you to savor the lively spirit of the city. Allow yourself to indulge in the serene clarity of a San Francisco evening, where the fog remains at bay, promising a delightful night and an uplifting start to the week ahead.
